goal: Identify 1) the key things a SaaS platform providers must do and must not do at the a) business, b) legal, c) technical, d) governance, and e) marketing/comms levels of their business and systems levels, in order to ensure its users who are lawyers maintain priviledge for priviledged client data stored or communicated through their SaaS Platform and 2) what specific relationship and role must they have with the lawyer in order to ensure that priviledge of client information is maintained.
